title: Spring greens and soft cheese on toast

ingredients.details: extra virgin, plus extra for drizzling
big stalks discarded and leaves shredded (about 300g shredded weight)

instructions: In a large frying pan, bring the vinegar, shallots, crushed garlic, 4 tbsp oil, salt, and some black pepper to a simmer. Add the greens and cumin, then fry for 2-3 minutes until wilted.

Rub each slice of toast with the cut half of the remaining garlic clove. Drizzle with a little more olive oil and pile the greens on top. Add a blob of soft cheese to each, splash over a little more olive oil, and serve with a tiny pinch of chilli flakes on top.
imageDesc: A wooden chopping board with a slice of toasted sourdough, piled high with wilted greens and soft cheese.
